thread.title: The week in whoppers: Joe Biden reveals Dems' true wish, Kamala Harris suddenly wants 'legal' migration and more
thread.title_full: The week in whoppers: Joe Biden reveals Dems' true wish, Kamala Harris suddenly wants 'legal' migration and more

author: Post Editorial Board Published Oct. 24, 2024, 5:52 p.m. ET President Biden said that "we gotta lock him up" while talking about former President Donald Trump -- just 14 days before the election. NY Post composite Diary of disturbing disinformation and dangerous delusions This charge: The right is making Trump's McDonald's photo-op into a three-day story by saying liberals are losing their minds over it >> pic.twitter.com/06l3U26nUv
title: The week in whoppers: Joe Biden reveals Dems' true wish, Kamala Harris suddenly wants 'legal' migration and more
text:
Diary of disturbing disinformation and dangerous delusions This charge: The right is making Trump's McDonald's photo-op into a three-day story by saying liberals are losing their minds over it >> pic.twitter.com/06l3U26nUv
— Brian Stelter (@brianstelter) October 22, 2024 We say: Sorry, Brian, but the left did lose its mind over Trump’s Mickey D’s photo-op: MSNBC trashed it as “bizarre,” questioned his mental health and slammed his french-fry salting.
The New York Times ran endless stories, even blasting his attire.
The Atlantic’s David Frum helpfully clarified that Trump “didn’t ‘work’ at McDonald’s. He posed.”
More From Post Editorial Board Don’t rush to end Gaza war, Dems’ blue-collar blues and other commentary Harris-Biden’s last-minute migrant moves are an attempt to hide their border mess Democracy danger alert! UK interfering in election to help Kamala Harris Memo to the left: Trump was not actually embarking on a new, fast-food career. He was: Staging. A. Photo-op. Lefties should order a McFlurry and chill out.
This excuse: “I speak honestly.” — Tim Walz, Monday
We say: Asked to explain his numerous falsehoods — such as that he was in Hong Kong during the Tiananmen Square protests or that he carried weapons of war in “war” — Walz gave one of his signature knucklehead excuses : He speaks “honestly.”
When a Democrat tells a lie, you see, he’s speaking “honestly.” Get it? We don’t either.
